article: The AP Government went a step forward to give memorable experience to Pushkar devotees by giving them option of flying in helicopter. The devotees can board the helicopter for 15 minutes and can have a view of all the pushkar ghats in Vijayawada.

Pushkar ghats witnessed heavy rush on Day 2 of Pushkarlu across Telangana and AP. Also, there have been few instances of rainfall. Devotees are advised to carry rain protection accessories like umbrellas and raincoats to the ghats.
